19.1.hd_quote: The tribe is not meant to be homogeneous.
19.1.behavioral_axis: Maintains individual identity while seeking tribal support, contributing resources without losing autonomy in interdependent relationships.
19.1.shadow_axis: Falls into dependency instead of interdependence, loses identity and goes against own principles to secure resources.
19.1.source: Line Companion (Ra Uru Hu) via normalized chunks

19.2.hd_quote: The dedication of personal resources as a result of external contact.
19.2.behavioral_axis: Called out by others as naturally ready to serve, trades personal resources for tribal support in mutually beneficial bargains.
19.2.shadow_axis: Becomes oversensitive when resources aren't reciprocated, feels exploited despite projecting willingness to serve.
19.2.source: Line Companion (Ra Uru Hu) via normalized chunks

19.3.hd_quote: The need to be wanted validated by numbers.
19.3.behavioral_axis: Experiments through trial-and-error with tribal bonds, learns what works by discovering who genuinely pulls their weight in resource exchanges.
19.3.shadow_axis: Becomes oversensitive about inadequate resources, fixates on numbers of people rather than the value inherent in relationships.
19.3.source: Line Companion (Ra Uru Hu) via normalized chunks

19.4.hd_quote: The energy to seek out and exalt in the company of others.
19.4.behavioral_axis: Externalizes driving force to gather tribal resources, brings enormous energy to work interdependently as long as others can keep up.
19.4.shadow_axis: Becomes dissatisfied with others' contributions, feels everyone is dependent on them and they must carry all the weight.
19.4.source: Line Companion (Ra Uru Hu) via normalized chunks

19.5.hd_quote: The need to limit personal potential in order to achieve a larger goal.
19.5.behavioral_axis: Receives projections of willingness to sacrifice for the tribe, recognized for potential to serve larger goals beyond personal resource needs.
19.5.shadow_axis: Becomes desensitized from constant sacrifice, condescends to those they serve, or performs self-sacrifice to satisfy projected expectations without proper principles.
19.5.source: Line Companion (Ra Uru Hu) via normalized chunks

19.6.hd_quote: The avoidance of contact in general but not exclusively.
19.6.behavioral_axis: Withdraws from tribal engagement unless convinced the whole process is worthwhile, waits to be sought out as proof of being genuinely needed.
19.6.shadow_axis: Oversensitive to rejection fuels self-imposed exile, sulks until others prove they need them by seeking them out and soothing their withdrawal.
19.6.source: Line Companion (Ra Uru Hu) via normalized chunks
